entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
